relation: Campus safety is average I would say. They do regular rounds to make sure everything on campus is good
I hear its okay, I personally do not like the Greek life but theres some good frats and soroities. They are not extremely expense I dont believe either.
We are close to the beach and there is a great trail to go running and biking on. The mall is also very close by.
The food is up to par and continues to get better, they are building new food establishments on campus as well.
Dorm life is not bad, it can get loud on the weekends but it is always pretty quite when it needs to be. The rooms are a good size and are clean. A bit expensive though.
The teachers have workable office hours around our schedules and there are always tutors there to help and the library is open till late.
Study very hard and don't get into the major party scene.
The campus is wonderful and very picturesque. The Chemistry Department is not the best but overall a great staff is there to help. The food is good and continues to get better.
pageTitle: Jacksonville University Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {161563=Jacksonville University has screwed up my financial aid and tuition. They told me to take an independent study when I really did not had to take one and now I owe them $1000., 79697=The internet gets really slow at the end of the night when everyone's homework is due at 11:59 pm and you would think that so much money could pay for a better internet connection, but that's as much trouble as you'll find., 171003=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC}

textAfterTable: Tips for prospective students Great school! Nice class sizes and tons to do. Very beautiful campus. Am enjoying being here Getting to know your professors and having them know you is great! Also the students are wonderful. Am learning a lot For me being a Music student I enjoying the small ratio of teacher to student. This allows me to expand my knowledge and grow as a musician. I am able to learn more than if I chose a much larger campus. Login to rate or flag the reviews Dori from Jacksonville, FL 07/24/2009 Reviewer is A current student here. 8 out of 10 people found this review useful. 3 of 42 Categories Comments Great for these types of students This is a great school for people who like hands-on work. The small class size definitely is beneficial to this kind of learning, as well as really getting to know other
